channel.title: Technical-docs on The Omix Metadata Index Project
channel.description: Recent content in Technical-docs on The Omix Metadata Index Project

item.title: Developer Notes
item.description: SRA The SRA metadata are mined from the reports/Mirroring directory. The files there include five XML files: Experiment Sample Run Study Analysis These five files each contain all the records from the NCBI copy of SRA, as well as all data that have been mirrored from the EBI and DDBJ, the European and Japanese partners for NCBI. An additional three csv files, fileinfo_addons, fileinfo_runs, and livelist contain technical metadata such as update dates and file sizes.
